normalised: O M G, brand collaborations are everywhere! Seems like every time you blink, there's a new influencer hawking something on Insta, right? From makeup tutorials featuring Lakmé products by Komal Pandey to travel vlogs showcasing Kerala tourism by Bhuvan Bam, the collaboration game is strong.

unnormalised: OMG, brand collabs are EVERYWHERE! Seems like every time you blink, there's a new influencer hawking something on Insta, right? From makeup tutorials featuring Lakmé products by Komal Pandey to travel vlogs showcasing Kerala tourism by Bhuvan Bam, the collaboration game is strong.
normalised: This season, everyone's prepping for Onam, and brands are jumping on the bandwagon. We've seen early reports of Myntra partnering with regional influencers to promote Onam sarees and even local biryani restaurants teaming up with food bloggers. Talk about targeting your audience!

unnormalised: This season, everyone's prepping for Onam, and brands are jumping on the bandwagon. We've seen early reports of Myntra partnering with regional influencers to promote Onam sarees and even local biryani restaurants teaming up with food bloggers. Talk about targeting your audience!
normalised: But is it all roses? Some are complaining about oversaturation. How many “Get Ready With Me” videos featuring the same face cream do we really need, ya know? Still, with budgets soaring and returns promising, expect the collab craze to continue. Experts estimate influencer marketing spends will cross rupee nine hundred crore this year. Will the bubble burst? Only time will tell! Stay tuned!
